name: Solo Blocks – Page Builder Gutenberg Blocks
author: SoloBlocks

sections.description:
Solo Blocks enhances Gutenberg’s editing potential by introducing custom blocks and additional features, simplifying the process of crafting visually striking websites – all without the need for coding expertise.

Solo Blocks is your ultimate toolkit for enhancing the WordPress block editor, giving you the power to craft visually stunning content. Each block is painstakingly developed with a keen focus on performance, ensuring that your website loads quickly and runs smoothly. Say goodbye to limitations and hello to limitless creativity with Solo Blocks!

Solo Blocks includes 22+ blocks:

  • Button
  • Counter
  • Image Box
  • Alerts
  • Image Carousel
  • Icon List
  • Accordion
  • Icon Box
  • Countdown
  • Tabs
  • Icon
  • Testimonial
  • Pricing Box
  • Typing Text
  • Toggle
  • Content Slider
  • Recent Posts
  • Section
  • Column
  • Group
  • Stack
  • Delimiter
  • New blocks coming soon…

Need assistance? Please read the documentation or contact our support.

SoloBlocks Help Center
sections.installation:
After downloading the ZIP file,

  1. Log in to WordPress dashboard panel.
  2. Go to Plugins Add > New > Upload.
  3. Click Choose file (Browse) and select the downloaded zip file of the plugin.
  4. Click Install Now button.
  5. Click Activate Plugin button for activating the Solo Blocks plugin.
    If the installation does not succeed, please contact us.
sections.faq:
Does it work with PHP 8.2?

Yes, our plugin is fully compatible with PHP 8.2

Can we use the blocks in any WordPress theme?

Yes, you can use them in any WordPress theme. Please note that the blocks are available in Gutenberg editor only.

Can we have extra custom options in blocks?

Yes, please contact our team and we will consider your new feature request.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Updated: Content slider and carousel controls
  • Improved: PHP 8.3 compatibility
  • Fixed: Minor bug fixes

1.0.0

  • Release
